Package hw4

Class VanishingElement

java.lang.Object
api.AbstractElement
hw4.SimpleElement
hw4.VanishingElement
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable
public class VanishingElement extends SimpleElement
An element that does not move. Instead, it is intended to appear on the screen for a fixed number of frames.
Author:
Nicholas Jacobs

  • Constructor Details

    • VanishingElement

      public VanishingElement(double x, double y, int width, int height, int initialLife)
      Constructs a new VanishingElement.
      Parameters:
      x - x-coordinate of upper left corner
      y - y-coordinate of upper left corner
      width - element's width
      height - element's height
      initialLife - the number of frames until this element marks itself for deletion
